thread.title: West Ham make £20million bid for in demand Celtic striker Moussa Dembele
thread.title_full: West Ham make £20million bid for in demand Celtic striker Moussa Dembele

author: Rory Brigstock-Barron
title: West Ham make £20million bid for in demand Celtic striker Moussa Dembele
text:
Sport West Ham make £20million bid for in demand Celtic striker Moussa Dembele The Hammers will offer close to their club record transfer fee in the hopes of landing the French youngster, who has attracted attention from a number of other clubs Share Moussa Dembele celebrates scoring the equaliser (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe 
West Ham have made a £20million bid for Celtic starlet Moussa Dembele . 
Mirror Sport understands that the Hammers will come close to breaking their transfer record in order to sign the French Under 21 international. 
The club hinted at the move in the "Insider" column on their website, saying "A bid of £20m – a figure close to the Club’s all-time transfer record – was submitted for a player from Scotland." 
Slaven Bilic's men had a £6m bid for Sunderland's Jermain Defoe and an offer for Scott Hogan rejected yesterday. The Frenchman celebrates scoring against Rangers last month (Photo: Daily Record) 
The 20-year-old Dembele has made a massive impact in Glasgow since arriving in the summer, scoring nine goals in 20 league appearances. 
The former Fulham star also impressed in the Champions League, with the likes of Tottenham and Liverpool also believed to be chasing his signature. 
But despite big clubs circling, Celtic boss Brendan Rodgers asserted as recently as Saturday that the Scottish Premier League leaders do not need to sell. 
“He won’t go in January. There’s no question about that. 
“We don’t need to sell. We need our best players here for the remainder of the season. 
“He has had a very good season and I can’t stop people writing about him or his valuation. 
“But he’s very happy here and enjoying working and developing. That’s the reason he came here.” poll loading Will Moussa Dembele go to West Ham? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
